    • Method Detail

      • poll

        public boolean poll()

      • rising

        public Trigger rising(Task task)
        Schedules the task only once when the input changes from off to on.

        In other words, this is a rising-edge monostable circuit.

        WHILE OFF : Nothing OFF to ON : Schedules task once WHILE ON : Nothing ON to OFF : Nothing

        Parameters:
        task - The task to run.
        Returns:
        This trigger, for chaining method calls.

      • falling

        public Trigger falling(Task task)
        Schedules the task only once when the input changes from on to off.

        In other words, this is a falling-edge monostable circuit.

        WHILE OFF : Nothing OFF to ON : Nothing WHILE ON : Nothing ON to OFF : Schedules task once

        Parameters:
        task - The task to run.
        Returns:
        This trigger, for chaining method calls.

      • risingWithCancel

        public Trigger risingWithCancel(Task task)
        Schedules the task only once when the input changes from off to on, and cancels the task when the input changes from on to off.

        WHILE OFF : Nothing OFF to ON : Schedules task once WHILE ON : Nothing ON to OFF : Cancels task

        Parameters:
        task - The task to run.
        Returns:
        This trigger, for chaining method calls.

      • fallingWithCancel

        public Trigger fallingWithCancel(Task task)
        Schedules the task only once when the input changes from on to off, and cancels the task when the input changes from off to on.

        WHILE OFF : Nothing OFF to ON : Cancels task WHILE ON : Nothing ON to OFF : Schedules task once

        Parameters:
        task - The task to run.
        Returns:
        This trigger, for chaining method calls.

      • useBehavior

        public Trigger useBehavior(Task task,
                           Trigger.WhileBehavior off,
                           Trigger.EdgeBehavior rising,
                           Trigger.WhileBehavior on,
                           Trigger.EdgeBehavior falling)
        Big boy method for consolidating all rising/falling/while logic.
        Parameters:
        task - The task to schedule / cancel.
        off - The intended behavior while off.
        rising - The intended behavior upon rising edge.
        on - The intended behavior while on.
        falling - The intended behavior upon falling edge.
        Returns:
        The Trigger, for convenience.
